Context: The Text provides information about the TLC ( tutoring services) at George Brown College, which is open for both in-person and online tutoring sessions. To use these services, one needs to register with their booking program using their GBC credentials. After registration, users can book appointments with specific tutors based on their requirements, especially important for math and accounting appointments. Users are advised to bring materials like assignments, instructions/rubrics, class notes, etc., to the sessions, which can be booked online and documents uploaded prior to appointment. The text also provides contact information, including a phone number (416-415-2000), TTY number (1-877-515-5559), email address (ask.george@georgebrown.ca), and links to their social media hub. The text also mentions that the information on the website is subject to change without notice.
